channel.title: LSE:ABF on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:ABF on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: AB Foods Expects Some Improvement in Sugar Profit Next Year
item.description: Associated British Foods Plc gave a muted outlook for its sugar division next year, saying it expects some improvement in profitability though prices remain below previous expectations.
